snippet: Oscar Pistorius completed his groundbreaking dual-Games trip to London by winning an individual gold, defending his Paralympic 400 meters title in the Olympic Stadium on Saturday.
abstract: Oscar Pistorius completes his groundbreaking dual-Games trip to London by winning an individual gold, defending his Paralympic 400 meters title in the Olympic Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius completed his groundbreaking dual-Games trip to London by winning an individual gold, defending his Paralympic 400 meters title in the Olympic Stadium on Saturday.

headline.seo: A Paralympic Gold for Oscar Pistorius
